synopsis.text:
What if you could trade the monotony of everyday life for a world of adventure and excitement? That's exactly what Moriko Morioka, a 30-year-old single woman, does when she leaves her mundane job to immerse herself in the vibrant universe of an online game. In this virtual realm, Moriko reinvents herself as Hayashi, a dashing young man with silky hair, leaving behind her real-world identity and embracing her new digital persona.

As a novice in this game, Hayashi struggles to survive until he encounters Lily, a charming healer who offers her assistance. Their friendship blossoms, and Moriko finds herself increasingly engrossed in her virtual life, rarely venturing out from her apartment.

Meanwhile, in the real world, Moriko crosses paths with Yuuta Sakurai, a handsome corporate employee with striking blue eyes and blond hair. Their encounter seems insignificant at first, but fate has more in store for them than they could ever imagine. As Moriko's online and offline lives begin to intertwine, she embarks on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, and love in this captivating tale of virtual escapism.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
